alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti waāmanū bimā nuzzila ʿalā muḥammadin wahuwa al-ḥaqu min rabbihim kaffara ʿanhum sayyiātihim wa-aṣlaḥa bālahum
dhālika bi-anna alladhīna kafarū ittabaʿū al-bāṭila wa-anna alladhīna āmanū ittabaʿū al-ḥaqa min rabbihim kadhālika yaḍribu al-lahu lilnnāsi amthālahum

fa-idhā laqītumu alladhīna kafarū faḍarba al-riqābi ḥattā idhā athkhantumūhum fashuddū al-wathāqa fa-immā mannan baʿdu wa-immā fidāan ḥattā taḍaʿa al-ḥarbu awzārahā dhālika walaw yashāu al-lahu la-intaṣara min'hum walākin liyabluwā baʿḍakum bibaʿḍin wa-alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi falan yuḍilla aʿmālahum
sayahdīhim wayuṣ'liḥu bālahum
wayud'khiluhumu al-janata ʿarrafahā lahum
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
afalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablihim dammara al-lahu ʿalayhim walil'kāfirīna amthāluhā
dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru wa-alladhīna kafarū yatamattaʿūna wayakulūna kamā takulu al-anʿāmu wal-nāru mathwan lahum
waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allatī akhrajatka ahlaknāhum falā nāṣira lahum
afaman kāna ʿalā bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu sūu ʿamalihi wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum

mathalu al-janati allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna fīhā anhārun min māin ghayri āsinin wa-anhārun min labanin lam yataghayyar ṭaʿmuhu wa-anhārun min khamrin ladhatin lilshāribīna wa-anhārun min ʿasalin muṣaffan walahum fīhā min kulli al-thamarāti wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khālidun fī al-nāri wasuqū māan ḥamīman faqaṭṭaʿa amʿāahum
wamin'hum man yastamiʿu ilayka ḥattā idhā kharajū min ʿindika qālū lilladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma mādhā qāla ānifan ulāika alladhīna ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalā qulūbihim wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum
wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
fahal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jāa ashrāṭuhā fa-annā lahum idhā jāathum dhik'rāhum
fa-iʿ'lam annahu lā ilāha illā al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wal-lahu yaʿlamu mutaqallabakum wamathwākum

wayaqūlu alladhīna āmanū lawlā nuzzilat sūratun fa-idhā unzilat sūratun muḥ'kamatun wadhukira fīhā al-qitālu ra-ayta alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun yanẓurūna ilayka naẓara al-maghshiyi ʿalayhi mina al-mawti fa-awlā lahum
ṭāʿatun waqawlun maʿrūfun fa-idhā ʿazama al-amru falaw ṣadaqū al-laha lakāna khayran lahum
fahal ʿasaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi watuqaṭṭiʿū arḥāmakum
ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
inna alladhīna ir'taddū ʿalā adbārihim min baʿdi mā tabayyana lahumu al-hudā al-shayṭānu sawwala lahum wa-amlā lahum
dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
dhālika bi-annahumu ittabaʿū mā askhaṭa al-laha wakarihū riḍ'wānahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
am ḥasiba alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu aḍghānahum
walaw nashāu la-araynākahum falaʿaraftahum bisīmāhum walataʿrifannahum fī laḥni al-qawli wal-lahu yaʿlamu aʿmālakum
walanabluwannakum ḥattā naʿlama al-mujāhidīna minkum wal-ṣābirīna wanabluwā akhbārakum
inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi washāqqū al-rasūla min baʿdi mā tabayyana lahumu al-hudā lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan wasayuḥ'biṭu aʿmālahum
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla walā tub'ṭilū aʿmālakum
inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi thumma mātū wahum kuffārun falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum
falā tahinū watadʿū ilā al-salmi wa-antumu al-aʿlawna wal-lahu maʿakum walan yatirakum aʿmālakum
innamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā laʿibun walahwun wa-in tu'minū watattaqū yu'tikum ujūrakum walā yasalkum amwālakum
in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum

hāantum hāulāi tud'ʿawna litunfiqū fī sabīli al-lahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fa-innamā yabkhalu ʿan nafsihi wal-lahu al-ghaniyu wa-antumu al-fuqarāu wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma lā yakūnū amthālakum
